Title: Schema document set interpreted as constraint schema document set
Text: Any XML schema document set whose c:pathURI attribute resolves to a constraint schema document set MUST be interpreted to be a constraint schema document set.

Title: Validity contraint context is value of c:xPathText
Text: Given a c:xPathText attribute owned by c:ValidityContext
column7: the validity constraint context for the descendant’s validity constraint SHALL be the value of c:xPathText evaluated against the IEP’s document information item (See [W3C XML InfoSet]
